author: travelandtourworld.com
title: United Airlines to Present at 8th Annual Cowen Global Transportation ConferenceTravelandtourworld.com
text:
United Airlines to Present at 8th Annual Cowen Global Transportation Conference Published on : Thursday, September 3, 2015
United Airlines will present at the 8th Annual Cowen Global Transportation Conference on Wednesday, Sept. 9. Gerry Laderman, United’s senior vice president of finance and acting chief financial officer, and Jim Compton, United’s vice chairman and chief revenue officer, will present at the conference beginning at approximately 11:30 a.m. CDT / 12:30 p.m. EDT.
Source:- United Airlines
